author: Dominic-Stafford
body:
Backports  #6499  (Rename herwigpp tool to herwig7 so that it can be found by scram tool info and gen checking script) and #6708 (Upgrade Herwig to version 7.2.2, and include patch for madgraph lhe files without merging).

Tested with workflow 535 and matchbox test command command from Herwig twiki, and with two madgraph + Herwig examples: one with merging, one without.
title: Rename herwigpp to herwig7, and upgrade to Herwig 7.2.2
